name: KeyHoler
description:
This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Theme for which was: "Holes", so made game with keyholes.

For this jam i tried to make a puzzle game, and improve how i manage my levels unlock system.

Controls

Move: A/D,Left/Right

Jump: W,Space,Up

All sprites, scripts and sound effects were created by me but music was created by:

 Quincas Moreira "Grasshopper"
